entry.title: Giorgio Chiellini makes superb claim about Celtic Park
entry.summary: It would be safe to say that Giorgio Chiellini is one of the best defenders of all time and he had some pretty positive comments about Celtic Park recently. The 39-year-old spent the majority of his career playing for Juventus and won more silverware there than one should try to count. Overall, he made more […] Giorgio Chiellini makes superb claim about Celtic Park - The Celtic Bhoys - The Celtic Bhoys - Celtic FC News, Transfer Rumours and Fan Community

entry.title: Celtic’s problem is very clear and needs solving quick
entry.summary: Two more dropped points mean that Celtic have well and truly allowed the Rangers to get back into the title race. A lead which once stood at seven points, could be reduced to three if Philippe Clement’s side are able to win their games in hand. entry.title: Brendan Rodgers addresses Celtic problem after draw
entry.summary: It was not the result Celtic were looking for, as they dropped two valuable points against Motherwell. David Turnbull’s goal appeared to have won it for the Hoops but the visitors equalised in the 90th minute and it ended 1-1. entry.title: Hollywood superstar pictured wearing Celtic jersey
entry.summary: It would be safe to say that Celtic have their fair share of famous fans. entry.title: Celtic pushing for priority signing in January window
entry.summary: Celtic’s January transfer window is expected to be a busy one. entry.title: Reliable source offers Sydney van Hooijdonk to Celtic update
entry.summary: Celtic are believed to be on the lookout for a striker in the January transfer window. There might be a few reasons behind that. entry.title: Ange Postecoglou claims Celtic success gets dismissed
entry.summary: Ange Postecoglou has proven to be a major success in the Premier League since swapping Celtic for Tottenham Hotspur.
